IMPORTANT: Total War Rome 2 Need to install on your PC. Caesar in Gaul is a package of independent campaign of Total War: ROME II in which the expansion of Julius Caesar is recreated against the Gallic tribes . Players can choose from four factions in this conflict. Gallic Arverni, the Germanic Suebi, Belgian nerves and Rome in a beautiful inspired by Gallico Commentarii (Comments on the Gallic Wars) Julius Caesar campaign 's map Caesar's campaign in Gaul follows a precise temporal and geographical scope to Rome II (58-51 a.) to provide a more extensive and detailed view of Gaul and the southern coast of Britain. Compared map of ROME II Gaul, Caesar in Gaul contains more regions and provinces, more factions (controllable and uncontrollable by the player) and a number of famous generals and historical politicians will fight for or against the player, depending on the faction you choose.
